english: It was the middle-class female solidarity .
chinese: 这是这位中产阶级妇女的团结思想。

english: Evan was a child of the middle class .
You know that's just middle-class bunk .
chinese: 你也知道，这边只不过是中产阶级的空话。

english: The french revolution was inspired by the bourgeois .
chinese: 法国革命受到中产阶级的鼓励。
他有一种中产阶级的思想。
中产阶级造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Jennifer hart was a fussy, middle-class woman .
chinese: 詹尼弗哈特是个喜欢无事自扰的中产阶级妇女。

english: The middle classes air their moral prejudices over their gross dinner-table .
chinese: 中产阶级在他们粗俗的餐桌上亮自己的伦理偏见。

english: From the white, middle-class english-speaking mold almost all of its teachers had emerged .
chinese: 这里所有的教师也都是出身中产阶级讲英语的白人。

english: Do we want to know about the feelings of a middle-class woman with a taste for vice ?
chinese: 我们难道要知道一个自甘堕落的中产阶级女人的各种感情吗？

english: I thought "mr. britling" is a very good study of the english middle-class soul .
chinese: 依我看，《勃列得林先生》这本书是对英国中产阶级灵魂的很好的分析研究。

english: The middle class is weak and ineffectual and tends to become dependent on and subservient to the ruling class .
chinese: 中产阶级软弱无能，趋向依赖和屈服于统治阶级。

english: The charm of britain has always been the ease with which one can move into the middle classes .
chinese: 大不列颠的引人之处就在于它可毫不费劲地使一个人进入中产阶级。

english: It was one of the most sweeping indictments of american capitalism ever drawn by a middle-class group .
chinese: 这是中产阶级集团草拟的对美国资本主义最彻底的控诉书之一。

english: Nixon shared many of the prejudices of uprooted, california lower-middle class from which he had come .
chinese: 尼克松出身于被赶出家园的加利福尼亚较下层的中产阶级，他具有这个阶级的许多偏见。
